ComicInfo.Summary:
Skye has taken matters into her own hands and has followed the mysterious being into the world existing within its pages. But what Skye finds inside changes everything and may prove to be too much for the Guardian of the Nexus to handle.
Skyeâ€™s new mysterious journey continues here!
